posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jerry Rucker
I'm kinda low on Hobby funds right now...so I thought I would test the trade market. I would be willing to trade these nice E90-1 Commons for T206 Hofers that I need. I would like to knock out a couple of top tier cards that I need but will entertain any trade offers for hofers that I need. 
Top-Tier Hof cards I need are 
Any Cy young Card
Johnson Portrait
Matty Portrait/White cap
Cobb Bat Off/Green
Lajoie Portrait/Throwing
Evers Portrait
Here's my T206's that I have
[url]http://imageevent.com/ruckers/t206hofers[/url]

Here's the E90-1's, If you see anything you like let me know
I collect T206 hofers in very nice SGC 50 grade almost exclusively..Would I entertain a trade for an sgc 40 top-tier card..you bet I would but it would have to be a high end crease free one. Anyway here's the e90's
